availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edmund H. Daniel (Caldwell County, Kentucky, laborer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, laborer. Caldwell County, Kentucky, native. Married to Minerva Perry Daniel in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on February 11, 1850. Laborer in Caldwell County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 280A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 509B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Caldwell County Marriages, Film #000851644.
Find A Grave, "Edmund H. Daniel (1829-1907)," Memorial #117767582, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/117767582 (accessed March 12, 2021).
